mapper.select:
SELECT borehole_id, borehole.name AS borehole_name, borehole.alt_names AS alt_borehole_names, is_onshore, completion_date,
measured_depth, mdu.unit_id AS mdu_unit_id, mdu.abbr AS mdu_unit_abbr, mdu.name AS mdu_unit_name,
elevation, evu.unit_id AS evu_unit_id, evu.abbr AS evu_unit_abbr, evu.name AS evu_unit_name,
prospect.prospect_id, prospect.name AS prospect_name, prospect.alt_names AS alt_prospect_names, prospect.ardf_number FROM borehole LEFT OUTER JOIN unit AS mdu ON mdu.unit_id = measured_depth_unit_id LEFT OUTER JOIN unit AS evu ON evu.unit_id = elevation_unit_id LEFT OUTER JOIN prospect ON prospect.prospect_id = borehole.prospect_id WHERE borehole_id = #{id}
